forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Rain Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. South southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
